Description.Text: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to hotel.
Located in Yaletown, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Rogers Arena, BC Place Stadium, and Canada Place. Granville Island Public Market and Stanley Park are also within 3 mi (5 km).

RoomType.text: DOUBLE CITY VIEW TWO QUEEN BEDS

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to hotel. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
